text: Kulomhlaba nakwelizayo futhi bakubuza ngezintandane ithi, â€œukubasiza kungcono kepha uma nizihlanganisa nabo mayelana nesimo sabo bangabafowenu futhi uMvelinqangi uyamazi umenzi wobubi kulowo owenza okuhle, ukube uMvelinqangiubethandaubenganifakaebunzimeni.Ngempela uMvelinqangi uphakeme ngamandla unobuhlakani
